title: Panthers knock top-seeded Bruins out of Stanley Cup Playoffs with thrilling overtime victory in Game 7
description: The Florida Panthers, who were down 3-1 in the series, came from behind to win the first round of the Stanley Cup Playoffs after a winning OT goal against the Boston Bruins in Game 7.

title: Katy Perry says she and fiancé Orlando Bloom 'continuously put in the work’ to keep their relationship strong
description: Katy Perry praised Orlando Bloom as her "fighter" Sunday, saying the two "continuously" work at their relationship. The couple have been engaged since 2019 and share a daughter.

title: New York City to hand out 500 free Apple AirTags to deter car thefts
description: New York City Mayor Eric Adams announced that a non-profit donated 500 Apple AirTags to the city, which will be distributed to automobile owners in an attempt to deter car thefts.

title: South Carolina AG challenges Democratic 'secret order' that freed convicted killer Jeroid Price 16-years early
description: South Carolina Attorney General Alan Wilson joins "Sunday Night in America with Trey Gowdy" to discuss the "secret order" that led to the early-release of convicted killer Jeroid Price.

title: Life-size statue of beloved walrus controversially euthanized in Norway unveiled in capital
description: A statue called "For Our Sins" that was dedicated to a beloved walrus euthanized in Norway last summer was unveiled in Oslo on Saturday.

title: Texas fugitive accused of killing 5 was illegally in US; deported 5 times
description: Francisco Oropesa, suspected of killing five people in Texas after they complained about him shooting his AR-15 late at night, had been deported five times, according to ICE source.

title: 16-year-old high school senior accepted into more than 170 colleges: 'All glory and honor to God'
description: Maliq Barnes, 16, shares the secrets to his success after he was accepted into more than 170 colleges and received more than $9 million in scholarships on 'Fox News Live.'

title: Prince William will honor King Charles in his coronation role
description: Prince William will play a key role in his father, King Charles', coronation this Saturday. The historic ceremony will be held at Westminster Abbey.

title: New Jersey couple arrested after allegedly trying to mow down officers
description: The Evesham Police Department in New Jersey arrested a couple on Sunday morning after allegedly trying to mow officers down in what started as a routine traffic stop.

title: Illinois gun shops see surge in sales after federal judge placed injunction on firearm ban
description: Gun shop owners reported a huge increase in sales after the U.S. District Court for the Southern District of Illinois issued an injunction against the enforcement of a firearm ban.

title: Florida 6-time felon busted with enough fentanyl to kill thousands with 4-month-old in back seat, police say
description: A Florida convicted felon was arrested by the Hillsborough County Sheriff's office and allegedly found to have fentanyl, a firearm, and 4-month-old infant in the car.

title: Heat in 'waiting game' after Jimmy Butler rolls ankle in Game 1 vs Knicks
description: The Miami Heat took Game 1 of their series against the New York Knicks on the road Sunday, but Jimmy Butler's rolled ankle puts them in a "waiting game" to see if he can play Game 2.

title: Middle school student allegedly sent home for refusing to change shirt that said 'There are only two genders'
description: Liam Morrison, a seventh-grader at Nichols Middle School in Middleborough, Mass., was allegedly sent home for refusing to remove a T-shirt that said. 'There are only two genders.'

title: Warriors run away with Game 7 behind Steph Curry's 50 points to end Kings playoff journey
description: The Golden State Warriors were down at halftime in the decisive Game 7 against the Sacramento Kings, but ended up running away with the win to move on in the playoffs.

title: Arizona man pretended to be a doctor, charged with 48 felony counts: officials
description: Arizona resident Jose Andres Lopez has been charged with 48 felony counts for allegedly impersonating a doctor and forging documents. Authorities are searching for his victims.

title: GOP Sen. Tim Scott to make major 2024 presidential campaign announcement on May 22
description: It looks like Sen. Tim Scott of South Carolina will be the next high-profile Republican to formally jump into the 2024 GOP presidential nomination race, with a May 22 announcement

title: Willie Nelson at 90: Texas legend shares a birthday to remember with George Strait, Snoop Dogg, and others
description: Willie Nelson celebrated his 90th birthday with a special concert, filled with stars like Snoop Dogg, Lyle Lovett and Ethan Hawke.

title: Washington Post reporter receives award for 'capturing the spirit of Joe Biden' and his 'Catholic faith'
description: Washington Post reporter Matt Viser received a prestigious award at the White House Correspondents’ Dinner for favorable coverage regarding President Biden.

title: Wisconsin man who fired shotgun at DoorDash driver sentenced to 5 years in prison
description: Wisconsin judge sentences Washington County man to five years after reaching a plea agreement in connection to firing a shotgun at a DoorDash delivery driver in February 2022.

title: California preschool teacher arrested for murder during naptime: police
description: Preschool teacher Diana Ornelas was arrested for murder along with friend Dennis Novoa. Ornelas, who worked at Children's Center of the Stanford Community, was arrested during naptime.

title: 2024 hopeful raises concerns on trans rights movement negatively impacting kids
description: GOP presidential candidate Vivek Ramaswamy said Sunday that the cultural movement of transgender rights in the U.S. "is creating more gender dysphoria."

title: Nevada children have experienced rare brain infections and abscesses as CDC investigates
description: After infections and brain abscesses in children tripled last year in southern Nevada, the CDC is investigating. Fox News Digital spoke with the pediatric neurosurgeon who treated the cases.

title: Blue Jays' Chris Bassitt slams tablet in tantrum after bad first inning vs Mariners
description: Toronto Blue Jays starter Chris Bassitt lost his temper after a rough first inning in his start against the Seattle Mariners on Sunday, smashing a tablet in frustration.

title: Davis, California sees second fatal park stabbing in four days
description: Davis, California police said a second stabbing occurred in the city at a park within four days, with the latest taking place on Saturday night in Sycamore Park.

title: Padma Lakshmi slams body shaming after posing topless online: 'be a little more grown-up'
description: Padma Lakshmi is not holding back when it comes to people critiquing her body online while she films cooking tutorial videos and eats naked in bathtubs.

title: Arizona mother allegedly shot husband while kids were home: police
description: Buckeye, Arizona resident Katherine Wheeler was charged with aggravated assault after allegedly shooting her husband multiple times at their home during an argument, investigators say.

title: Heat use second half surge to take Game 1 over Knicks at Madison Square Garden

title: Sen. Coons goes on defense as one issue continues to hurt Biden in polls with his own party

title: FBI releases new photos of fugitive accused of fatally shooting 5 neighbors in Texas, including boy, 8

title: Virginia woman arrested for allegedly abducting 3-year-old at mall: police

description: Michigan State University (MSU) biologists have found that bugs will thrive in a warming world, according to new research into climate and environment.

title: Most people make this major mistake sharing photos
description: Every time you snap a picture, your phone stores metadata. That includes details like the device you took it on, your camera settings, and where you took it.

title: Avalanche's Andrew Cogliano suffers fractured neck on controversial hit vs Kraken

title: Don't fall for these wrong number texting scams

title: Boston SatanCon-goers shred Bible, pro-cop flag during opening ritual: ‘Hail Satan!’

description: DHS Secretary Alejandro Mayorkas argued that President Biden has delivered immigration solutions while Congress has failed to pass legislative reform.

description: CNN political commentator Scott Jennings said President Biden was mocking the press and laughing at members of the media during his remarks.

description: Although Las Vegas is known for its casinos — and they're worth a visit — there are tons of other things to do such as see a show, explore the strip's hotels or take a ride on a gondola.

description: Kailer Yamamoto scored with 3:02 left in the game and helped the Edmonton Oilers get passed the Los Angeles Kings on Saturday night, 5-4.

title: New Jersey families bring Kirk Cameron to 'tears of hope' at 10th public library book event
description: Kirk Cameron has been speaking to American families at public libraries across the nation as part of a book tour — and in New Jersey, he told Fox News Digital he was brought to "tears of hope."

description: A 20-year-old woman told rescuers she was "free climbing by herself" at Pinnacle Peak Park in Scottsdale, Ariz., when she got stuck between two boulders.

description: As the Biden administration rolls out their “National Cancer Plan" this month, Washington can help make this critical bipartisan goal a reality by cutting unnecessary bureaucratic red tape.

description: Francisco Oropeza, a Mexican national accused of shooting five neighbors in Cleveland, Texas, remains at large and "could be anywhere." FBI is assisting.

description: Democratic Portland Mayor Ted Wheeler defended his track record on homelessness, crime and police funding in his city on "Lawrence Jones Cross Country."

description: Roo Powell is the founder of SOSA, a nonprofit that supports survivors, spearheads child abuse prevention initiatives and advocates for a safer internet.

description: There have been three important phone calls in my life. One was when I got a call at the start of COVID from President Trump asking me to become his White House press secretary.

description: Former President Donald Trump spoke out about his relationship with the late Queen Elizabeth II, whom he met in London in 2019, on "Life, Liberty & Levin."

description: Two people were killed and another was hospitalized after a shooting in Seattle, Washington, Saturday night. The wounded victim was left in critical condition.

description: The Biden administration is set to expand its prohibition on lead ammunition usage across wildlife refuge area, sparking condemnation from sportsmen and Republicans.

title: Abuse of prescription ADHD medication on the rise for middle, high schoolers
description: More middle and high school students are abusing prescription ADHD drugs like Adderall and Ritalin, which treat symptoms of ADHD like inattention, hyperactivity and impulsivity.

title: New York man allegedly stabbed victim with ice pick in 'unprovoked' attack, police say
description: New York police said a man was waiting for the subway with his friend when he was stabbed in an unprovoked attack. The victim was taken to a hospital in stable condition.

title: Arkansas woman indicted after selling stolen body parts for $11K
description: An Arkansas woman allegedly sold stolen body parts from medical school corpses to a man in Pennsylvania for $11,000. She pleaded not guilty to 12 counts.
